CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Periodic indicative notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.MA_MAIN_ACTIVITIES: Urban railway / light rail, metro, tramway, trolleybus or bus services
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01G04

TI_TEXT.P: Servicevirksomhed i forbindelse med reklame og marketing
Servicios de publicidad y de marketing
Services de publicité et de marketing
Servicii de publicitate şi de comercializare

TITLE.P: Management, Development, Selling & Maintenance of SPT Advertising Space and Infrastructure.

SHORT_DESCR.P: SPT is seeking a renew its current Management, Development, Selling & Maintenance of SPT Advertising Space and Infrastructure contract (Lot 1) within the Glasgow subway (15 subway stations), Bus Stations and any other advertising channel or mode identified during the contract.

In addition a further Lot (Lot 2) will be included for the Supply, Installation, Management, Development, Selling and Maintenance of SPT Advertising Space and Infrastructure for an initial two large format advertising sites on SPT property with the potential for further sites during the duration of the awarded contract.
A further call for competition will be made on reduced timescales, however companies can express an interest in this notice by emailing procurement@spt.co.uk.
SPT may engage with suppliers expressing an interest to establish further market information prior to issuing a tender.

TITLE.P: Management, Development, Selling & Maintenance of SPT Advertising Space and Infrastructure

SHORT_DESCR.P: SPT seeks to appoint a forward looking and innovative Supplier with the required and proven experience to manage, exploit and develop the full range of advertising and promotional opportunities available from SPT's wide-ranging activities and existing infrastructure which includes static and digital modes.

The successful Contractor's prime objective will be to maximise revenues from the core advertising estate (Subway and Bus Stations ) highlighting, developing and exploiting new revenue streams and generating new opportunities within these areas as well as examining all other modes eg. ticketing,vinyl wrapping etc. etc..

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: 1) The renewal of this contract will be dependant on the successful tenderers submission.
2) Previous contracts have been awarded for up to a maximum of 5 years generally 3 plus two however other options may be offered within tenders.

INFO_ADD.P: SPT will require space for its own advertising.

TITLE.P: Large Format Advertising: Supply, Install, Management, Development, Selling and Maintenance of SPT Advertising Space and Infrastructure

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has identified an initial two sites capable of displaying large format advertising and can potentially offer an indicative pipeline of six or more future sites to be brought forward during the duration of the awarded contract.

The maximum duration of the contract wil be determined on the basis of the time that the successful tenderer could reasonably be expected to install and recoup on the investment made in operating the contract together with a return on investment to SPT taking account of the initial two sites and future opportunities.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Renewal / duration of contract will be made on award of contract with the duration of the contract being determined on the basis of the time that the successful tenderer could reasonably be expected to install and recoup the investment made in operating the contract together with the return on investment to SPT.

INFO_ADD.P: 1) This is a new opportunity to install and develop further advertising infrastructure.
2) No contract duration has been set and tenderers will be requested to put forward differing options with a final decision being made prior to award of contract.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: 1) Successful tenderers will require to sign up to a Service Level Agreement and Key Performance indicators following award of contract.
2) Management reporting information in relation to sales of space, revenues will be required on a regular basis.
3) Reports and presentations of information on updates / changes within the OOH Market place will be required throughout the duration of the contract(s)

4) SPT will require during the contract access to conduct a full audit of income and expenditure. SPT at its sole discretion shall determine the information which is considered reasonably necessary for the purposes of conducting a full audit.

INFO_ADD.P: 1) The current Lot 1 Expires on 31st March 2017 and will not be awarded until the expiry of the current contract.
2) Lot 2 may be awarded earlier than March 2017. However the award of this lot will be at the discretion of SPT and no guarantees that an award will be made can be be provided.
The contracting authority reserves the right to require deposits, guarantees, bonds and or other forms of appropriate security.

4) The successful service provider will be required to participate actively in the service related economic, social and environmental regeneration of the locality of and surrounding the place of delivery of the contract
5) A percentage of advertising space will require to be made available to SPT

NOTE: To register your interest in this notice and obtain any additional information please visit the Public Contracts Scotland Web Site at http://www.publiccontractsscotland.gov.uk/Search/Search_Switch.aspx?ID=464259.
